name: Mehri W
text: It's not here. There used to be a Little Caesar's here, and maps says it still is, but that lot in the building is empty. Don't go here for pizza, you will be disappointed.

name: Ella Belle Wilson
text: We always got good pizza at the Ponderay store. We usually had to with but that was because we'd order 2 pizzas with extra cheese. I stopped by today to get our usual order, but the restaurant has been gutted and is gone. So sad, as this was our fave for inexpensive pizza. I was hoping that they just moved, but I can't find them.

name: Jessica Hope
text: They had a little machine in here that you played a game to win free breadsticks I've never seen this at any of the other Little Caesars locations I've been to it made it fun to be there and I ended up ordering two pizzas and another order ‚Ä¶More

name: Nadine Colegrove
text: The worst service I have ever had in my life!!!!!!!! I ordered three pizzas and they said it would be ready in about 12 -15 min. Well it was 58 min before I got my pizzas. I watched them give other people who had ordered after me, the ‚Ä¶More

name: Mr. Spessa
text: Wrote a poem about this place, like to hear it? Here it goes: "Pizza smells good, pizza is neat, that's why I wear pizza boxes on my feet!" I'm considering adopting it into a short rock opera, but Meatloaf isn't returning my calls :(

name: Judy Meyers
text: Over a four hour period I served up 55 of their pizzas for a big event.  Caitlin the new manager here, and her staff, were incredibly helpful as I kept calling them to order more.  Their 5$ pizzas were perfect for feeding a crowd like that.

name: JoAnna Skrivseth
text: I was so disappointed in my service. I don't know who the manager is, but it is not being managed well. Stopped in for a quick dinner for my family last night. A lot of people were waiting and I was told a 15 minute wait. I realize this can ‚Ä¶More

name: Joshua Mata
text: Great Pizza.üôÇüëçüèªso said its gone.

name: Hailee
text: I love how you can walk out of here with a hot and ready pizza within a matter of minutes. I don't like how the prices seem to be higher here than other locations I have been too. I have also run into issues with them not actually having ‚Ä¶More

name: Jeff Thaxton
text: High prices, poor quality. Little Caesars advertises $5 hot and ready. This store doesn't honor that price. Hot and ready crappy pepperoni pizza will be just shy of $8.

name: Hudson Lee
text: Fast, easy, cheap. Pizza on a budget. And personally, I like it better than Pizza Hut.

name: Wes Britton
text: Pizza. Tasty. Hot 'n' Ready. Pizza, oh wait, I said that part already.

name: adam Overby
text: It's quicker, larger, faster and cheaper then any other fast food chain in the country and if I happen to have leftovers it's reheatable! What more do you need to know

name: Tia
text: Delicious pizza, Friendly employees, great Price With only 10 minute wait for Deep Deep Dish pizza

name: Richard McCoy
text: There no such thing as a $5 hot and ready pizza here, it's $6. None of their prices much the commercials.

name: Annie Legrand
text: Great food, excellent service.  And delicious.

name: Veronica Bonagofski
text:
Today I have a RANT! DO NOT EVER WORK FOR LITTLE CEASERS IN PONDERAY!!!!!
So i have worked at little ceasers in ponderay since September. To my surprise I got promoted to store manager as soon as I learned the store on November 1st. ‚Ä¶More

name: Andrew Shelley
text: Called in and was in contact with someone who sounded to be under the influence of some substance and they were rude to my fianc√©.  Asked for a simple request and they acted like it was a total huge deal. Then when I arrived approximately ‚Ä¶More

name: Kyle Ahmann
text: Couldn't get a simple oder of pepponi and crazy bread right. Plus the guy before me's pizza was burned badly

name: Theresa E
text: Awesome staff and great pizza

name: Wendi Van Dyke
text: Great food great price!!! Out PIZZAS the hut!!!

name: McKenzie Ross
text: Will never go back very rude horrible pizzas.

name: Trevor Kennedy
text: Only one bad experience. Great prices.

name: Thomas Jaeger
text: Great for quick meal

name: Lisa Manske
text: Best of the big pizza chains.

name: Edward
text: Pizza ok other sides suck

name: Tara Patterson
text: By far beat service I've received at a little Caesars.

name: Oren Jenkins
text: Cheap and delicious :)
